3031.name: Isle of Arran Brewery
3031.description: Located close to Brodick Castle.   Opened late March 2000.  Ales include Blond and Dark.  Arran Brewing Company has called in the administrators after running into cashflow problems. Graham Martin and Laurie Manson of PricewaterhouseCoopers were appointed as joint administrators to the company early in May 2008.
